title: Strengthening Service Quality Practical Competencies: Design of Chemistry Multimedia Learning Environments for Fostering Scientific Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can systematically apply the scientific thinking process (observation-hypothesis-experiment-analysis-conclusion) to solve chemistry problems.
Learners can explain chemistry concepts by connecting them to real-life examples using multimedia environments (virtual labs, scientific language tools, etc.).
Learners can engage in scientific discussions and provide feedback to peer learners via online collaboration tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
